alert.note: Alert for Monroe (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 4:07PM EST until February 24 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding along Irondequoit Creek * WHERE...A portion of western New York, including the following county, Monroe. * WHEN...Until 730 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding along Irondequoit Creek. High levels on the creek may result in flooding at Ellison Park, and along Blossom Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 359 PM EST, Irondequoit Creek had crested and will continue to gradually drop overnight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rochester, Irondequoit, East Rochester and Brighton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
